channel.title: R on Elisha Cohen
channel.description: Recent content in R on Elisha Cohen

item.title: Notes on creating this site
item.description: Installing Hugo Don’t use the instructions on the theme webpage – this installs a submodule that just confuses things. Follow the directions in the blogdown documentation. I also adjusted the size of my image to be similar to the example image. Not sure if this is necessary. Making changes/ Creating posts Once changes are complete: build website in RStudio. I’ve been using the Build Website icon on the Build panel (blogdown::build_site() should do the same thing).

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
